title: Headhunter Nidalee has been broken for the entirety of this patch. Why isn't it being disabled?
body:
For anyone who hasn't noticed, her spears have no texture.
So, basically, she throws invisible spears every time.
This should have been disabled or fixed long ago, instead of letting people abuse it for this long.

Enjoy your freelo.

replies.body: This is only true if you have your texture settings at "Very Low"

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cTEFUEew,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-06T16:47:15.779+0000)
>
> This is only true if you have your texture settings at "Very Low"

I'm playing at maxed out settings and still only see the faint orange glow. Actual spear particle is invisible. It is hardly noticeable alone, but in a team fight with flashing spells and missiles flying left and right it might as well be fully invisible.

Also, this should go to Bug reports section.

So, this still hasn't been dealt with.
Every time Nidalee is picked, they use this skin.

Hey I have not seen this(then again I don't see people play with HH Nid) BUT........El Tigre has the same issue with his Q. Hardly visible compared to Dragonslayer and no skin.  My duo partner usually complains about it.  I see but it is slightly hard to see for some I suppose. Wondering if this is similar to your problem or if you have seen this?
{{champion:201}}
I play with everything set to low but I still see that spear and Jinx W.
Jinx W is the same... Mundo cleaver was this way last patch, not sure about this one
Send it to Riot as a support ticket.  They may make the image bigger or brighter, but, there's nothing we can do from here and it's hit-or-miss whether a Red will notice board posts.
i totally agree nidalee such bs right now
